message:
Add long-requested ability to configure the polling rate for the WatchService that Jimfs creates for watching for directory changes.

This is done in such a way that it doesn't make it awkward to create a new WatchService implementation in the future.

Fixes https://github.com/google/jimfs/issues/14.
